parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: An array of api fields to be returned in the response, if not specified number, title, company, status, totals and quoteddate will be returned.

parameter.name: subTotals
parameter.description: An array of sub totals to be returned in the response, if not specified then only Fields/Totals will be returned.

parameter.name: subTotalsDateOption
parameter.description: The subTotalsDateOption specifies the date to group by when using a date option in the 'subTotals' parameter.

parameter.name: apiFields
parameter.description: The apiFields filters the response based on the API fields values. Provide an API Field ID and String separated by a comma. Multiple API Field IDs and String pairs can be provided by separating them two pipe characters. E.g. 2,Europe||3,Industrial||3,Commercial.

parameter.name: apiFieldsMode
parameter.description: The apiFieldsMode specifies the Mode used for the apiFields parameter. Possible values are 'any' and 'all'. Defaults to 'any'.

parameter.name: approvedDateFrom
parameter.description: Quotes approved on or after this date will be returned. Provide either the specific date(yyyy-mm-dd) or a relative date(- +/-Xd/w/m/y).

parameter.name: approvedDateTo
parameter.description: Quotes approved on or before this date will be returned. Provide either the specific date(yyyy-mm-dd) or a relative date(- +/-Xd/w/m/y).

parameter.name: companyIds
parameter.description: An array of company Identifiers, specifies the Quotes under the specified companies to be returned.

parameter.name: divisionId
parameter.description: The division identifier specifies the Quotes under the specific division to be returned.

parameter.name: grandTotal
parameter.description: The grandTotal specifies the quotes having the specified grandtotal values to be returned. can be a number(e.g. 300) gte number(e.g. gte300, greater than or equal to the specified value) or lte number(e.g. lte300, less than or equal to the specified value).

parameter.name: idFrom
parameter.description: Quotes with ID greater than or equal to this value will be returned.

parameter.name: idTo
parameter.description: Quotes with ID less than or equal to this value will be returned.

parameter.name: lastModifiedFrom
parameter.description: Quotes added/edited on or after this date will be returned. Can provide either specific date and time(yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm) or relative time(Xn/h/d/w/m - X minutes/hours/days/weeks/months ago).

parameter.name: lastModifiedTo
parameter.description: Quotes added/edited on or before this date will be returned.

parameter.name: projectIds
parameter.description: An array of project Identifiers, specifies the Quotes under the specified projects to be returned.

parameter.name: quotedDateFrom
parameter.description: Quotes created on or after this date will be returned.

parameter.name: quotedDateTo
parameter.description: Quotes created on or before this date will be returned.

parameter.name: search
parameter.description: The Search string, Quotes where Number or Title contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchDescription
parameter.description: The searchDescription string, Quotes where Description contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchNumber
parameter.description: The searchNumber string, Quotes where Number contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchQuotedBy
parameter.description: The searchQuotedBy string, Quotes where Quoted By contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: searchTitle
parameter.description: The searchTitle string, Quotes where Title contains string(e.g. testString) or does not contain(e.g. !testString) will be returned. A minimum of 3 characters are required.

parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status specifies the Quotes under the specified status to be returned. Possible values are pending(default), approved, active, declined and all.

parameter.name: subTotal
parameter.description: The subTotal specifies the quotes having the specified subtotal values to be returned. can be a number(e.g. 300) gte number(e.g. gte300, greater than or equal to the specified value) or lte number(e.g. lte300, less than or equal to the specified value).

parameter.name: taxable
parameter.description: The taxable specifies the Quotes having the specified Taxable status to be returned. Possible values are true, false and all(default).

parameter.name: taxTotal
parameter.description: The taxTotal specifies the quotes having the specified taxtotal values to be returned. can be a number(e.g. 300) gte number(e.g. gte300, greater than or equal to the specified value) or lte number(e.g. lte300, less than or equal to the specified value).

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The type specifies the Quotes under the specified status to be returned. Possible values are pending(default), approved, active, declined and all.

parameter.name: validToDateFrom
parameter.description: Quotes valid to/after this date will be returned.

parameter.name: validToDateTo
parameter.description: Quotes valid to/before this date will be returned.

parameter.name: pageNumber
parameter.description: The pageNumber(must be used with pagesize) to return a subset of Quotes.

parameter.name: pageSize
parameter.description: The Page Size(must be used with pagenumber).Paging options are not available together with the 'subTotals' parameter.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: The sortBy specifies the Sort field. Possible values are id, number(default) and title.

parameter.name: sortOrder
parameter.description: The sortOrder specifies the sorting order. Possible values are asc(default) and desc.
